Support ‚Äã

This page contains important information about contributing, security, and supporting the development of this package.

Contribution Guidelines ‚Äã

We welcome contributions! If you'd like to contribute to this project, please read our contribution guidelines to understand the process and requirements.

View Contribution Guidelines ‚Üí

Security ‚Äã

If you discover a security vulnerability, please report it responsibly. Do not open a public GitHub issue.

View Security Policy ‚Üí

To report a security issue:

  • Email: hi@jcsoriano.com
  • Include a clear description, steps to reproduce, and potential impact
  • We will acknowledge receipt within 72 hours and work on a fix

If you find this package useful and would like to support its development, consider supporting me through one of these platforms:

Your support helps me continue building and maintaining this package. Thank you! üôè
